attributes.action: Speak out against the repressive regime in Zimbabwe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fact
Zimbabwe is in economic and political meltdown
Robert Mugabe and his cohorts live in 5 star luxury
The developed nations are ignoring the facts

Fact
Ordinary Zimbabweans are starving
Political intimidation and killings are common
There is no freedom of speech or association
Life expectancy is 39
1 in 4 people has HIV
Inflation is running at over 3000%
Unemployment is 80%
80% of the population are living below the poverty line
Zimbabweans need your help

Action
Call for Mugabe to step down
Humanitarian aid is required to stop mass starvation
Speak out against the abuse of basic human rights
Call for free and fair elections monitored and enforced by an international task force

Remember
Not to speak out against this tyranny is to condone it

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Speak out against the repressive regime in Zimbabwe."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13696.asp

Prime Minister's Office
